article_title: Dirt bikes, dogs don't mix: North Attleboro Animal Shelter says clamor rattling canines

og.description: NORTH ATTLEBORO - At the North Attleboro Animal Shelter, the loud whirr of dirt bikes in the surrounding woods can be more than disruptive, Animal Control Officer Karen Fontneau says.
